thread.title: Los Angeles and Dallas Colocation Packages from Psychz Now Include Helpful New Features
thread.title_full: Los Angeles and Dallas Colocation Packages from Psychz Now Include Helpful New Features

author: admin
title: Los Angeles and Dallas Colocation Packages from Psychz Now Include Helpful New Features
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/25/2015 @ 12:27 PM   Psychz 
LOS ANGELES, Sept. 25, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Psychz, a company that offers dedicated hosting, DDoS mitigation and other services, has just added some new and helpful features to their Dallas and Los Angeles colocation services. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150925/270795 
As a spokesperson for Psychz explained, the company is now offering Free Anycast along with distributed DDoS protection for their Los Angeles and Dallas colocation clients. 
"Anycast allows advertising of same IP via globally deployed DNS servers," the company spokesperson said. 
"When a visitor comes to your website, they will be sent to the server that geographically closest to them. This will lead to websites that load faster and it also offers lower latency." 
Thanks to the distributed DDoS protection, the colocation services in Los Angeles and Dallas ensure that DDoS attacks are distributed to ensure that their clients' internet services stay online. 
In addition, when clients colocate in Los Angeles and Dallas, the content is protected against natural disasters and network failures. For example, if the Los Angeles datacenter is affected by an earthquake or other disaster, the Dallas datacenter will continue to server data and keep services online. 
As the company spokesperson explained, with the addition of the Ashburn datacenter scheduled for November, Psychz will expand their Anycast feature, along with the better protection against DDoS attacks, natural disasters and network failures. 
Even before the new features were added to Psychz's colocation packages, the company's Los Angeles and Dallas colocation services were already excellent. For example, at the company's datacenter in Los Angeles, the cooling equipment is independently dual-powered, and the fault-tolerant site infrastructure offers electrical power circuit storage and distribution facilities. The Los Angeles datacenter can provide 100-plus gigabit of internet capacity to a meet-me room located at One Wilshire. 
"The service offers multiple fiber wavelengths and can be used on all major providers, including Hurricane, China Unicom, Tinet, Comcast, PCCW, China Telecom, China Next Generation, Zayo, Telia and more," the company spokesperson said. 
Anybody who would like to learn more about Psychz's new colocation package features is welcome to visit their user-friendly website; there, they can read about the newly added services. 
About Psychz: 
Psychz has been in the web hosting industry since 2001 and now operates its own infrastructures, networks, and in-house staff. Psychz specializes in dedicated hosting, colocation, DDoS mitigation services in Los Angeles and Dallas datacenter. With years of experience, proper disaster planning has been implemented to preserve enterprise level data and services. For more information, please visit https://www.psychz.net/colocation.html 
Media Contact: George Becerra, Psychz, 626-549-2801, george@psychz.net 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Psychz
